price: 8. Мре (Zakariya) alobi: Oh Nkolo wa ngai! Ndenge nini nakozala na mwana ya mobali mpe mwasi wa ngai abotaka te, mpe bopaka bosili kozua ngai?
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لِي غُلَٰمٞ وَكَانَتِ ٱمۡرَأَتِي عَاقِرٗا وَقَدۡ بَلَغۡتُ مِنَ ٱلۡكِبَرِ عِتِيّٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi annā yakūnu lī ghulāmun wakānati im'ra-atī ʿāqiran waqad balaghtu mina al-kibari ʿitiyyan
